about_the_game:
A demo version of HordeZ showing off one level of the game. Supports multiplayer with the full version but only on Level 1. Difficulty is limited to 3 (out of 6) and only one map is available (out of 11).

Default mode is Arcade mode. Make sure you have the right controller in the right hand (health indicator).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

  • OS: 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better
